Class TimeUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.TimeUtils

  • public class TimeUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to manipulate things related to the Time.
    Author:
    Patrich Tivoli

      • adapterCiphers

        private static java.lang.String adapterCiphers(int number)
        This method makes a string from an integer, the resultant string will be composed by two characters. Since it's just needed for the time there's no need to have more than two characters.
        Examples:
        • Input: 0 Output: "00"
        • Input: 1 Output: "01"
        • Input: 12 Output: "12"
        • Input: 13 Output: "13"
        • Input: 123 Output: "23"
        Because of this, tasks that last longer than 99 hours, 59 minutes and 59 seconds are not supported by this program.
        Parameters:
        number - the integer that need to be converted
        Returns:
        the string representing the integer but with two characters
